casebody.data:
KEGLEY
v.
CITY OF FAYETTEVILLE. No. 342P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2005. Karen M. McDonald, City Attorney, Benjamin R. Sullivan, Anthony Fox, Charlotte, for City of Fayetteville. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of September 2005 by Petitioners for Urgent Stay Pending Appeal: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of September 2005." Justice BRADY recused.
